Hi,

I am a newcomer to JUnit and i have the following question:

I am trying to use JUnit with a framework (an internal product in my
company), and the idea is that I need to start the framework before being
able to use JUnit: the application uses many services from the framework so
it means that the framework must be initialized in the beginning.
After this initialization I start junit from the constructor of one of my
classes using:
                final String[] cmdline = { "client.AllTests" };
                TestRunner.main(  cmdline );

But then, whenever I want to use any of the services of the framework I
realize that all the static members of all the classes are null, so it means
that I cannot use singletons in my tests, any idea why is not working?

thanks,
--Carlos--
subject: Singletons and JUnit
